values: i forgot i had this.... how shite am i lol... lets forget eeeeverything iv ever posted lol....

well... im updating my LJ cuz lozzie moaned at me for not updating it regularly :P
so.. whats been happening in the life of natty.. not much lol..
ma mate jennie was invited to her mates halloween party at the weekend.. and she didnt wanna go herself.. so she asked me davey and gillybob to go along with her... but when we got there.. all the way to denniston!... her mates g/f wasnt happy about us being there cuz she didnt know us.. so.. we had to leave.. so we dropped by asda on the way home for juice and chubes.. and then all four of us went to my house.. mmmmmm yogurt..
after gillybob and jennie left.. ma mum came home... quite drunk lol... which was a good laugh...
3 hours sleep that night i got then i had to get up and go to matalan lol... wooo i just love my job.. 
monday.. hmm what happened on monday.. oh aye... stupid feckin freezin college!.. started back after being off for like a month lol... oh am not gunna be lookin forward to all this work.. this is what happened last year... in the end i never passed... so i gotta get ma finger out this year... so if u all see me online each night... kick ma ass and tell me to get back to work! cuz i soooo wont have time for the internet! til like feburary!.. if then!
ooh today i went shopping in matalan hehe.. i bought trousers.. pjs.. and stripey pants!.. wooo! go me.. now al be skinto completely... ahh well.. 
at college tomorrow.. *cries*.. but on friday after work.. i might be goin to see saw2... which should be good... but davey is having to stay with me that night cuz am a big scaredy cat hehe.. and i sit up all night lookin at the door..
aaaaaanyhooo i gtg now... ma brother wants on.. so i gotta go on ma own comp... bah... ahh well... tis warmer up there...
hope u enjoyed my random ramblings lozzie..

byeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

The Keys to Your Heart

You are attracted to those who are unbridled, untrammeled, and free.
In love, you feel the most alive when your lover is creative and never lets you feel bored.
You'd like to your lover to think you are stylish and alluring.
You would be forced to break up with someone who was insecure and in constant need of reassurance.
Your ideal relationship is lasting. You want a relationship that looks to the future... one you can grow with.
Your risk of cheating is zero. You care about society and morality. You would never break a commitment.
You think of marriage as something precious. You'll treasure marriage and treat it as sacred.
In this moment, you think of love as something you can get or discard anytime. You're feeling self centered.

Goooooooooooooooood evening journal readers!

Sooo.. time has consisted of coming home from lynseys on thursday.. goin to tracys engagement on friday night.. going to davids house on saturday and sunday.. starting work on monday.. david coming to mine yesterday..

Tracys party on friday lol.. was a laugh.. sat with 2 guys called "felvie" and "G" hehe.. funny names.. they do actually have proper names.. but they insisted on being called that lol.. sat talkin to them for the whole night.. and sang to like every song that came on.. felvie informed me he had trivium on his mp3 player and let me listen to it =D *chuuuffed!*.. went up to get shtuff to eat.. felvie came back with a bit of chocolate cake with tuna pasta on top of it!.. and to make it even more ewwww.. he put tomato sauce on it... yuuuck!.. aye so that was mingin!.. later on i requested the casper slide song and the timewarp haha.. i got david, G and flevie up to do the casper slide haha.. david ran away for the timewarp lol.. durin the night they decided they were gunna thro peanuts down ma top o_O.. they got quite a few down there aswell!.. i thot i took them all out.. but when i went home and changed.. 3 fell out lol.. ewww i hate peanuts.. aye well that was friday.. *nods*

Oooooh i got a job! did i tell ye's? yaaass! am in the money! *dances* Matalan in craigneuk wooo
it doesnt seem too bad.. once ye know how to work the tills and all the things u have to remember! tis alot for ma wee brain!.. ahh well.. i worked 10am til 2pm on monday... wasnae too bad... flew in!.. just got shown about the shop.. where they fire exits n shtuff are.. introduced to a few people.. whos name i have now forgot.. ooops.. im workin 5pm til 9pm tonight.. hope its not too bad.. hopin they put me next to sumone so if i get confused they can help me lol.. ill just need to let the customers know am new and if they want served quicker.. then go to another till! lol

aye and i have a new b/f called david.. hes dead nice.. i love his cat.. hes called max.. hes adorable.. he loves attention and likes being hoovered haha!.. ma cat just thinks hes too good to sit next to ye unless ya gunna feed him.. im thinking about catnapping max.. any ideas on how to go about it? =D

well i should really go get ready and do ma hair for work.. but i prolly wont til like the last moment =D
talk to ya'll later stinky people!

x natty x

Yes.. i was THAT bored!! haha me? noisy? not at all! *squeaks*

Hahahahaha i hit ma face on a plant pot lol...

aye.. yer right... wtf am i talkin about... ok al start fae the beginnin if u werent there :P

lynseys party on saturday.. well.. wasnt so much a party lol cuz only 7 people where there lol.. and 3 of them sat n watched the telly lol... but the 4 of us.. me, lynsey, eddie and david.. were out the back with sum drinks "alcoholic beverages".. then we decided to start on the shots we bought lol... sidekicks.. in chocolate and strawberry and various other flavours... hehe 72 shots.. between 4 people.. haha what a state i was at 8.30pm!!.. i was the worst out of everyone lol. i fell everywhere.. kept slipping on ma trousers cuz theyre too long for me.. spilt a shot all down ma trousers lol it looked really wrong when it dried in lol... fell off a chair outside... fell into a plant pot and bruised ma face lol.. scraped ma elbow on the slabs out back lol... the list goes oooon and oooonn... lol a lost ma lip bar and eddie spent aaggess outisde lookin for it lol.. with no luck.. awwh.. after hayley and stacy and kenny left.. we decided to play spin the bottle lol... always fun... then i fell some more *nods*.. n decided to go upstairs with david.. that was fun too *nods*.. al spare details.. lol... david went away about half 12.. and i went upstairs and me lynsey and eddie decided to sing rather loud for a while yip... we rock.. dont think the neighbours agree tho!... 
got about 4 hours sleep that night.. and woke up feeling soooooooo sick.. blah!.. i think i drank just a tad too much.. yes.. just a tad!.. :D
anyhoo... am still shattered!.. woke up at 8.30am today so lynsey could go sign on... bllaaahhh... she better not wake me tomorrow... or she'll get a few toes up her A HOLE yuuuup!
well... so thats my eventful weekend... can ye top that?.. no?.. didnt think so!..

well i better go.. wee boxes are flashing... im loved... woo!

byeeeeeeee x

That Much!
well after dumping richie i went out with david... i stayed with him 2 days later and was stupid enough to sleep with him... now.. iv not seen him since!.. suprise suprise... apparently hes too busy... 
Me: So when can i next see u then?
Him: Well am not busy til next tuesday
Me: oh right.. am at ma dads this weekend.. we could meet up in town..
Him: yeah sure

next day

Me: so u wanna meet in town tomorrow?
Him: i dunno what im doin yet myself! iv arranged to meet 3 people tomorrow! al let u know!

why tell me ur not busy and then arrange to meet 3 people when u KNEW i was gunna ask again to meet... that doesnt sound like sumone that wants to see me...
Him: if it bothers u that much that im too busy then why dont u just dump me!
Me: ok ur dumped

So then i arranged to meet sumone from FP in town after speekin to him for one day.. o_O yea anno..
Went to see batman... was a good film!
Me and this guy kissed loads and then he went home...
next day he lets me know that he had a good time.. but doesnt wanna relationship... just sex... so if am up for that then thats cool...

On my contact list.. 11 guys.. 11 GUYS! just wanna have sex with me! nothing else... just loadsa sex! no relationships!? just sex... wtf?!

WHY DO GUYS JUST WANTS SEX ALL THE TIME?!
WHAT IS IT WITH YOU PEOPLE?!

AAAARRRGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Today i went shopping again with lynsey... tis always a laugh =D
i bought black jeans (as per usual), two wee black spikes for ma lip, a rainbow hairband, and a wee hair clip... and i also got a flower made out of a balloon from the clown... yaaaay! pretty things!
seen david on the way to the train station.. yaay more pretty things!
got on the train... had to actually stand! pffft! lazy people not gettin up for me! and to make it better.... ma balloon flower popped! *cries* i got a fright! and so did all the people sitting.. muwahahaha!
aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaanyhoo.. am bored.. this is where al be sat for the rest of the night.. blaahh... and i have toothache... poo!

Weeellllll.... long time no writey!
hmm where to start.. well last week i went to town to meet ma matey david on sunday... had a wee wander about the town all day... then he had to go cuz the buses suck on sundays.. ahh well...
on wednesday i went to town with lynsey this time.. she rocks... she looked at me funny alot tho... it rained all day... and we got all soggy... even tho we had a wee umberolly... and ma hair went PFFT!.. yes.. pfft.. was a very cool day tho!
went to davids gig on thursday.. his band are really good i thot... even tho lynsey sed all the bands sucked lol... she has no taste.. she likes NFG o_O i know.. well... got a kiss from david ;).. and then this scary guy kept proddin ma piercins and chattin me n lynsey up... after the gig.. i stayed at lynseys and went home on friday.... 
saturday david came to mine.. and on sunday i went to his... trains suck! took me 2 trains and 2 buses just to get home!! grrr arg..
sunday when i came home i decided i had enough of richie so i dumped him... but he annoyed me.. so i told him about david... im now a wait.. gets the words right... "two faced untrustworthy compulsive cheatin slut" haha.. oh well.. shit happens... davids much cooler anyhoo... hes a singer... guys that can sing are automatically hot... even tho hes a geek hehe and he doesnt ask me where i am, what am doin, who am with, where am goin, what am wearin... etc... tis great! im freeeeeee!! *does a dance*
OH there was the HUGEST jenny ling lang in the kitchen today! i tried to kill it myself.. with the fly swat thingy... but i missed and it started flyin about... so i screamed and ran out the kitchen and shut the door... waited an hour before there was a knock at the door... the man to read the meter! yaaay! i asked him to kill the ling lang.. and he sed no!!... so.. another hour i was locked outta the kitchen til ma brother came in! he killed two! TWO! *screams* 
aaaaaaaanyhooo
goin to annoy george at work tomorrow if hes there... cuz am boooored..
saturday am goin wanders about glasgow with my lynsey friend... i want more jeans before ma money disappears...
sunday i got a band practice to learn the words to pointless songs... hopefully do a gig soon if i get the hang of the lyrics...
ok... i write alot... see ya in another few months!

x thee natty x

Well yesterday was rather... interesting... 

met tracy in motherwell so we could go to georges and get pierced.. started to rain when i got to m/well tho.. so i went to the pound shop and bought a umbrolly.. and when i went back outside... it stopped rainin! typical!... we got the bus to georges work n stood and talked to george for a bit n listened to sum music while tracy spoke to "james" (her fiance) on the fone about gettin her lip done... he told her not to get it done.. and she was actually gunna do what he says! til me and george convincved her after more fone calls to james... ahh well... got the other side of ma lip done... hurt like fuck this time! n its all swollen :( bled a helluva lot aswell... poor wee lip... it will look pretty in a couple of weeks tho i hope =D

after the piercing, #pOiNtLeSs# had a gig at street level cuz another band pulled out... 2 days notce we got for it! how ye ment to learn n practice songs that quick?! lol.. so we done seven nation army, radio ga ga, and hypnotize.. because we knew those ones.. and had practiced them in march lol... stacy and hayely also played a few songs with no words.. just to fill up sum time.. after the gig.. a few people told me that it was a good set.. and i was a good wee singer =D *chuffed* hehe

george never spoke to me all night at the gig... could have at least came up to us and told us what he thot... if we were good or shit... i meen i go to all his gigs and support him and he never even spoke to me last night... aaarse!

got the bus home.. eventually! after standin about while adam (stacys b/f) went in a huff... i hate him... hes an arse... totally ignored me all night even tho i made an effort to speek to him... blah!..

came home and had pie... mmmm pie... that made my day =D then i sat online talkin to people.. yay! people!

ok im done now.. ull all be glad to know..

tattie bye bye

x natty poo x

Ok.. i thot of sum more things to say.. 
its aload of crap but read if ye like..

todays adventures consisted of a little trip to college to fill in bank details so they'll gimme money... mmmm money... *drools*... mmm shopping... *drools more*..
anyhoo!.. they told me that i wont get it if my atendance isnt over 80%.. now considering all the times iv not bothered to go in... mines is 86%! woo! but then they also told me that it goes by what im achieving in class... which is basically nothing... so i think thats the amount of money ill recieve.. big fat nothing.. *cries*.. oh well..

after college me and ma mum went to the big w.. which is now woolworthes.. and is now aload of shit... could easily wander around the big w for hours... we got bored in there after 10 mins!! had to leave... very crap...

then we went to asda and i got cornflake cakes! yyass! they rock! they take me ages to eat cuz they hurt ma gums lol.. but they still rock!

now am home.. and bored.. oooooh wait! its friday! no college tomorrow! yaaass!!!... i should maybe do sum work over the weekend... yes... thats what al do... work... the joys..

ok am goin now... cant think of anythin else to right...

tattie bye

x nat x
